If you're interested in Shakespearean drama and a star-studded cast including Tippi Hedren, Talia Shire, Kevin Dunn, and Bob Gunton, 'The Taming of the Shrew' (1593) would be a good choice.

For those looking for a more offbeat and thought-provoking film with artistic elements, 'I Heart Huckabees' (2004) starring Dustin Hoffman and written by Ethan Coen, would be suitable.
